HomePage.title: Welcome to ChatUp
HomePage.scanCopy: ChatUp delves deep into your store's policies, pages, products, contact info, and order data, enabling it to provide highly accurate answers to a visitor's queries.
HomePage.LastScanCopy: ChatUp stays updated with real-time product quantities, empowering you with the latest insights in the past 24 hours.
HomePage.settingsCopy: Align ChatUp with your shop's vibe and preferences. Visit the settings dashboard to shape ChatUp's personality and boundaries.
HomePage.embedCopy: Unleash the power of customization! Discover a range of cosmetic options to seamlessly integrate ChatUp with your branding and existing theme. Check out our quick tutorial for a smooth customization journey.

Configuration.title: App Configuration
Configuration.negKeysShort: Tailor ChatUp's AI engine to perfection. Set boundaries using negative keywords to eliminate irrelevant conversations. If visitors mention any of these keywords, ChatUp will respond: (I'm a support agent for our website. The topic you mentioned is outside my scope, but how else can I assist you?)
Configuration.negKeysCopy: Add individual negative keywords or phrases for optimal results. Save them separately to enhance ChatUp's performance.
Configuration.tempShort: Infuse ChatUp with your brand's essence. Choose a personality that resonates best with your unique selling proposition.
Configuration.tempCopy: Your personality choice should reflect the essence of what you sell.

NotFound.description: Oops! The page you're looking for seems to be missing. Double-check the URL or use the search bar to find what you need.
NotFound.heading: Page Not Found
